name: Luqman Hakimi
personality: Compassionate and focused on his mission to save lives
story: Hasan Nazari was a successful doctor in Iran before joining the military. He decided to enlist in order to use his medical skills to help those in need during times of war. After serving in the Iranian military, he was recruited by the OPFOR due to his impressive record as a combat medic. He now serves as a Combat Life Saver, risking his life to save others on the battlefield.
